original_text: Therefore set I in the lower places behind the wall, and on the higher places, I even set the people after their families with their swords, their spears, and their bows.
korean_text: 내가 성벽 뒤의 낮고 넓은 곳에 백성이 그들의 종족을 따라 칼과 창과 활을 가지고 서 있게 하고

sentences.original_text: Therefore set I in the lower places behind the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 내가 낮은 곳에 성벽 뒤에 배치하고

sentences.original_text: I even set the people after their families
